description.what: Transitioned to Product and Development Manager
description.info: After maintaining Product Management duties alongside managing the Analyst team at Power Ledger for 8 months, I transitioned to a full-time role within the Development team as the Product Manager.

I managed the Analyst team, which ranged from 5-9 team members during my time as the team lead. The Analyst team was resposible for drafting business development proposals, data modeling and analysis, and platform QA testing
https://youtu.be/4v3F5W1IBHk
Money 20/20 in Las Vegas, Ethereal in San Francisco, BlockSplit in Split, Croatia, Climte-Kic in Paris, Event Horizon in Berlin.
Began working at Power Ledger as they're first fulltime employee. Today we have 25 employees.
Thailand, Vietnam, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Malaysia and Indonesia.
Finished my degree while studying at the University of Western Australia in Perth, Australia
Time to get my nature on. Gonna climb a mountain.
While studying at the University of Calgary, I worked 2 years with Red Bull as the campus Student Brand Manager
Finally finished up a side project I've been wanting to do for ages. Check it out here!
I'm honored to be chosen as one of the 2017 Iowa STATEment Makers!
A whole new adventure awaits!
Spent the summer createing business impact assessment models and strategies to address the findings.
See the real deal at @cassidoo!
I spoke on a panel called Dev Evangelism: Building a Community of Advocates.
I was included as one of LinkedIn's top professionals 35 and under!
Joined as Clarifai's lead developer evangelist and front-end software engineer.
